attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to see a holy cheeto but there were NONE. NONE!!! As i cried alone in my cottage, I heard the faint voice of the god herself, yagami yato. I unlock my window and she extends her neck and her face is suddenly inches away from my phone that’s in my hands. She shows me all the documents of cheeto president RAPING young girls!! Very disappointing😠 She grabs me by the neck and we fly away to capture this rapist president. We arrive at the white house, kidnap him, and we’re on our way. We teleport to Daddy Sangwoo’s house and he does his job by breaking his ankles and throwing him into the basement along with Kokichi Ouma.😌After our work was finished, Yagami went home to record a Hawks x Listener for her patreon, and i went home and cried about my toxic household🥰🧚🏻‍♀️✨UHHHHHH anywayzz, lesbians hmu my snap is eggroll706 hehe🙈💕
attributes.title: YAGAMI YATO DISAPPROVES😠

attributes.review:
I was really looking forward to be part of the community and take a more active role for our team but this app asks for way too much private information that is unnecessary for it to function.

Be careful about protecting your privacy!
Stay safe!
attributes.title: 😟 DISAPPOINTING

attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app as a proud stupid mindless white supremacist supporting another I didn’t expect the ugly Cheeto man to hack my Twitter and spam tweet all over my account making me loose all friends and lovers on twitter. Garbage and cost me getting laid by some pretty hot housewives and their husbands.  -4/10  

Wish I could give this -2 stars but the AppStore said nah. Buzzkill. Plus that pedo flooded my photo albums with his deformed nudes.

attributes.review: So, I was hungry one day, and decided that I should find an app that lets you order food. I saw this orange guy and I thought if I downloaded the app I would get oranges. I got nothing so I guess the app doesn’t work at all.
attributes.title: I just wanted some food

attributes.review: This app stole my data and sold it to the Chinese government. This app is a threat to national security and should be banned immediately.
